mapper.sql: SELECT C.CMT_NO, E.EMP_ID, C.CMT_SRT_TIME, C.CMT_END_TIME FROM CMT_TB C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(C.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID)
mapper.select:
WHERE C.CMT_MONTH = ${ cmt_month }
AND C.EMP_NO LIKE '%' || #{emp_no} || '%'
AND C.CMT_NO LIKE '%' || #{cmt_no} || '%'
ORDER BY CMT_DATE
mapper.update:
UPDATE CMT_TB
CMT_SRT_TIME = #{cmt_srt_time},
CMT_END_DATE = SYSDATE
WHERE CMT_NO = #{cmt_no}
